# gx-gauge-range

Component used within `gx-gauge` to draw and show its range.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                | Type     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `amount` | `amount`  | The amount of range length.                                                                                                | `number` |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color property defines the color of range background. Color value can be in any color model _(hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, cmyk)_. | `string` |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the range.                                                                                                     | `string` |

## Events

| Event                   | Description |
| ----------------------- | ----------- |
| `gxGaugeRangeDidLoad`   |             |
| `gxGaugeRangeDidUnload` |             |
